segments.text: I see the boy standing on that stool, and it’s making me so angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s being so reckless, and his mother is right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being really irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless they’re all being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, completely unaware of the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve ever been taught to be more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip, and the boy doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone steps in before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just making me really frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR
